name: Pong (itch) (micaluzbenitez)
description:
Pong

Welcome to the famous two-dimensional game that simulates the table tennis!!!

What is this game about? Players will control the black paddles by them only vertically, hitting the ball from one lake to the other. If one of the two misses the ball, the opponent wins a point. The first to reach a certain number of points wins!

The number of points to win is predetermined at 12 but in settings it can be changed if desired.

You can play against the computer or in pairs.

Player Powerups:
- Shield
- Enlarge paddle
- More speed
These powerups are activated when one of the players reaches a certain amount of points. These will be disabled if you lose the ball.

Random powerups:
- Multi ball
- Obstacle in the field
- Invert speed
- Invert player controls
Random powerups that will appear on the field. If either of the two players stops above any of these powerups, one is activated at random, and it will last a certain amount of time, depending on each powerup.
